reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.subtitle: Find out what our satisfied customers say about Taco Jesus

reviews.name: Anna Kowalska
reviews.text: Incredibly delicious tacos! The atmosphere is simply amazing, you feel like you're in real Mexico. The staff is very friendly and the food is prepared quickly. I'll definitely come back!

reviews.name: Michał Nowak
reviews.text: Best burrito in Poznań! Large portions, fresh ingredients, and the taste is simply divine. I order via Glovo regularly, delivery is always fast.

reviews.name: Katarzyna Wiśniewska
reviews.text: Great place for a family dinner! Kids are delighted with nachos, and adults enjoy authentic tacos. Reasonable prices, top quality.

reviews.name: Piotr Zawadzki
reviews.text: Taco Jesus is not just a restaurant, it's an experience! Every dish is a work of art. I especially recommend the quesadilla with cheese sauce. Simply finger-licking good!

events.title: Events & Promotions
events.subtitle: Join our fun events and don't miss out on great offers!

events.title: TACOWEEN
events.subtitle: Halloween with Mexican accent
events.description: Special menu with "scary" tacos, costume contests and Mexican music. 20% discount on all dishes for those who come in costume!

events.title: Día de los Muertos
events.subtitle: Day of the Dead Mexican style
events.description: Traditional Mexican holiday with authentic dishes, calavera decorations and special cocktails.

events.title: Taco Tuesday
events.subtitle: Weekly promotion
events.description: Every Tuesday 30% discount on all types of tacos! Come with friends and enjoy the best tacos in Poznań.

events.title: Mexican Fiesta
events.subtitle: Mexican party
events.description: Big Mexican party with live music, dancing, contests and unlimited tacos!

events.follow_description: Subscribe to our Facebook to not miss special offers and new events
